storyInfo: Tequila returns to Dossoles, and upon meeting a few people close to him, his thoughts on his future become clearer.

attributes.content: Dossoles – Casino
Hey, what’re y’all looking at over there?
attributes.name: Skeptical Customer

attributes.content: You gotta come check this out! The boss is throwing his hat into the ring with one of the gamblers. Hurry, the winner's about to be decided!
attributes.name: Excited Customer

attributes.content: What's the big deal? Who's the foolish fella sittin' across the table anyway? Never heard of the legendary boss at the gaming table?
attributes.name: Skeptical Customer

attributes.content: Hahaha, come over here. You'll see.
attributes.name: Excited Customer

attributes.content: That's the guy.
attributes.name: Excited Customer

attributes.content: What?! That guy? He's got the balls to come back here?
attributes.name: Skeptical Customer

attributes.content: Pssh, the fact that he's got the balls to sit at the table means the Mayor already decided to write off everything he's done.
attributes.name: Excited Customer

attributes.content: River. Any bets?
attributes.name: Dealer

attributes.content: Thanks, I'll check.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Haha, what is there to be unsure about?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: That's the guy you're going in with, boy?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: What difference does it make if you can keep one of his hands attached to his wrist? Look at him now. Wandering the streets, eyes completely dead. But, the moment he walks into a casino, tch... His eyes light back up.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: C'mon, this is Dossoles, and people like that are everywhere.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Then why don't I see you sitting down at any of the other tables?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Well... The poor guy's only got one hand left. Life's gonna be pretty hard if he loses that one too.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Who knows how he lost his other hand. For all you know, a guy with his character probably lost it at some gambling table.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Actually... he lost it in a war.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: He used to be a soldier under my father's command. I've known him since I was little.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Molly, bring me another glass.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Give it up. You can't beat my hand.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Sorry about this, boss.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Flips cards over)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Woah... That's a hell of a hand.
attributes.name: Excited Customer

attributes.content: Royal... Flush? Haha, my god, that kid's got some absurd luck.
attributes.name: Skeptical Customer

attributes.content: (Molly, think this kid's...?)
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: (I didn't see him making any suspicious moves. Do I need to call someone?)
attributes.name: Dealer

attributes.content: (No, forget it.)
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: (I hear Señora Sanchez has some plans for him... So we'll consider this a favor.)
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: You're sure that guy's hand is worth so much to you? You'd have to give up all your chips. A pretty high price, if I do say so myself.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Hahaha! Boss, if someone offered you this much money for a hand, you'd be the last man at this table to hesitate.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Molly, untie him and let them leave.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Dealer

attributes.content: Make sure you check every one of the guy's fingers. With that price tag, we can't afford to be careless.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Haha, how could I question your integrity? Your good name is known far and wide.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: As for you, Señor... You look like you haven't had a good night's rest in a long, long time. Go home, enjoy a nice shower, and sleep.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto, I...
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Sorry, boss. I still have some urgent business to attend to, so I've gotta go.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto! Ernesto! Wait!
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I kept calling for you, but you didn't answer so I had to follow you.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Señor, did you need anything else from me?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I don't know if you still remember me or not, but we met before. You were still young, barely up to my knees. Your mother was there at the time, leaning against the doorframe just like that.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: I do... Of course I remember, Señor José.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: My mother and I barely had a centimo to our names. If you didn't cross an entire warzone to send supplies back home to us, we would've had a hard time making it through that winter.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I was only following Señor Pancho's orders. I never deserved to stay in your memory so long, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: After I joined the army, I wanted to find you and thank you, but my father told me that you had been wounded and subsequently discharged.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: That's right. There's no place on the battlefield for a man short a hand.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Did you come back to meet... Or rather, visit Señor Pancho?
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Yes. I'll see him at noon.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I'll leave you to it then. Don't be late on my account.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Ah... There are so many things in the past I thought I'd never remember again. But when I saw you, those days turned crystal-clear once more.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: I thought I had forgotten it all myself...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Señor José... You should give up gambling.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Haha, you have the wrong idea. I'm going home, back to where I belong. After all you went through to bail me out, how could I dare to go back?
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: If, and only if you really need it, you can come looking for me. I can't guarantee you a whole lot of work, but it should be enough to get you back on your feet.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Thank you, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Down-and-out Gambler

attributes.content: Dossoles – Prison
You're late. I waited a whole hour for you.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Sorry, Dad. Something came up along the way and slowed me down.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Are you trying to make excuses for your tardiness, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: The fault is mine. I'm very sorry, Father.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Hmph. Looks like a year at Rhodes Island has plucked some of those flowery words from your mouth.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: There aren't so many people at Rhodes Island who need to be flattered, so I don't have to speak the way I did before.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Really now? You never mentioned any of that in your letters.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Because it's not important, I didn't feel a need to bring it up.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I suppose there's not much you could say on that silly little sheet of paper.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Right. Actually, there are a lot of things I want to tell you.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: But, Rhodes Island's business is more complicated than I thought, and it's hard for me to find the time to sit down and write a comprehensive letter. The best I can do is to pick out some important things and go over them briefly.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Dad, did you know that Rhodes Island has several operators from Bolívar? One of them goes by Señora Dobermann. She was a soldier like you.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: And I opened up a weapons shop. There are lots of knowledgeable hands there, and I always enjoy doing business with them.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Also, there's the Doctor and Señora Kal'tsit––
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Enough, Ernesto! What did I tell you before you left?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Don't worry, Dad. I've been taking good care of Rafaela. She's in excellent health and enjoying her life.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I've heard that same story from you half a million times on your little scraps of paper.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: She... is a grown woman, Dad. There are some things I can't just go asking her.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I said, enough! That's not the only thing I told you!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Oh... You're talking about that.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I see... right, that.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I told you to figure out your future, sooner rather than later.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Don't become complacent. Don't squander your talents in pursuit of a cushy life. Have grand ambitions.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I'm definitely going to end up in Bolívar. But it's not time for that yet.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: How long do you intend to wait then? Until your hair turns grey? Until Bolívar is smashed to pieces?!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Dad, I... I still have doubts to work through. There are still many things I have to make sense of, both about myself, and about Bolívar.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: This is all because I underestimated the influence that Candela woman had on you. I never imagined that even if you left this place and lost contact with her, you'd still cling to her bag of tricks the entire time.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I know you didn't agree with Ms. Candela's way of doing things, Dad, but I have to recognize that she also had her reasons.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You really take after your mother with all that indecisiveness. Had I known earlier, I would've ignored her pleas and raised you myself. At least that way, you could've at least been a resolute, unflinching soldier.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Mom never did anything wrong. Raising me under those conditions wasn't easy. The hardships and sacrifices she had to go through are more than you could imagine, it's not your place to criticize her.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Sorry, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Dad, do you know who I met on the way here?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Señor José. He was one of your runners for three years.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: That one, huh.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Do you remember how many times you had him bring back supplies for me and mom?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: He told me, he still remembers my mother. Not the cold, unmoving version of her in photos, but the version of her that's vivid in his memories.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I thought I was the only one who still remembered her like that...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Do you think I've never yearned for her in my heart, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Before Mom died, she told me that when she first met you, she had a flower pinned to her chest, and it was the flower that drew you to her from the crowd.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Dad, do you still remember what flower it was?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Don't remember.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: That's too bad. I was hoping you would be able to tell me.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Please wait, Mr. Ernesto.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Hah, long time no see, Mr. Booker.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Lady Candela heard that you returned to Dossoles, and hopes to meet with you.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: If you don't mind me asking, what does Miss Candela need me for?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Please get in the car. Lady Candela will let you know once you arrive.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Well... I was planning on paying her a visit anyway. I appreciate the lift, Mr. Booker.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: This is... a wedding venue? This is where Ms. Candela is?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: With me, please. She's waiting at the frontmost table.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: (Taps at the glass with a fork)
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Conductor, would you mind pausing this wonderful melody? I'd like to offer a few words to the new couple.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: During this short half a lifetime of mine, marriage has always been such a distant word. I have loved deeply, but love has never given me the courage to enter such a special contract.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What kind of courage must one find before signing over his hand to another with which he has no blood relation, along with his property, body and soul, and future?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Before the wedding, I asked our groom, Mr. Will, if he was aware of the risks that came with this undertaking, akin to walking into the wilderness naked.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But, he told me that he would weather any storm just to see that flower on the other side.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: (Raises glass) Go forth then, Mr. Will, and bravely trek into that raging storm. Fill every day and night of her life with happiness.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: May your love be true for all of eternity!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: May your love be true!
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: (Squeezes his lips tightly)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Lady Candela, he's here.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: It's been a while, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ms. Candela, long time no see. Have you been well?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: What is he doing here? The gall of that man, showing up at a wedding reception hosted by Lady Candela...
attributes.name: Guest A

attributes.content: Shh... Keep your voice down. She invited him here. Remember how she said before the ceremony that she'd bring a special guest?
attributes.name: Guest B

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, I'm sure you're all familiar with this young man. His name is Ernesto Salas, one of my most capable staff. He used to work in the International Trade Management Department.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Welcome back to Dossoles, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Guest B

attributes.content: I appreciate the warm reception, sir.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Have you been enjoying your extended vacation, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: There's nothing worth concerning yourself over, Ms. Candela. Though I did run into some unexpected surprises, I've been well overall.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Unexpected surprises? I'd like to hear more.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Your eyes look a little red. Is everything alright?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I've been away too long, and I've forgotten how hard the wind blows along the beach here.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Is that so? I think the wind is pretty tranquil tonight, just the way I like it.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Did you... refloat this boat?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Yes. I planned to decorate it at the end of the year and put it back into use.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Even after all those explosions, even sinking to the bottom, it can still serve?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: It has served me faithfully in the past, so I didn't want to move on. Even now, I still look forward to how it will serve me in the future, and fully believe in its potential.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You never struck me as the nostalgic type.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: What matters to me isn't how long something has been around, but rather how long it'll last.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Besides, truly worthwhile things aren't afraid to stick around for a while, just like the bottle of rum sitting on the table – produced in my private winery, aged for seven years, the finest batch of that year.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Seven years in the darkness has only served to enhance its aroma.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Would you like to try a glass?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Haha. Thank you, Ms. Candela. Half a glass will do. After being away for so long, I can't hold my liquor as well as before.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: That is fine. Mr. Booker, please pour out half a glass for our guest.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ah, I can do it myself.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Raises eyebrow) Are you no longer accustomed to our way of doing things?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I appreciate it, Mr. Booker.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Mayor's Bodyguard

attributes.content: Thank you. Now then, Ms. Candela, if you don't mind.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Takes a sip from the glass)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: How is it?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Rich and full-flavored indeed. I would expect nothing less from your discerning tastes.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: But do you like it?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Haha, this came from your personal collection. How have another opinion?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You went to see your father. How's he doing?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Well, he's still in decent health. Thank you for looking after him. I will always remember this favor.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Hmph. I'm sure that stubborn old fossil had some choice words for me, even locked away in prison.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: No, no. If anything, the brunt of his criticism was directed at me, over how I'm nothing like him and don't share his ambitions.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: A pity he's so old and addled he can't even recognize his own son.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Hahaha... Always the joker, Ms. Candela. There's no father out there who couldn't understand his own son.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You are anything but lacking in ambition. If anything, your sights are higher than just this one city.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I'm not sure what you mean by that.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Dossoles will not always belong to me. I am getting older, while its glory continues to shine ever brighter. More and more people flock to it, and I am searching for someone.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Someone who can help me defend this light in a world surrounded by feral beasts, someone who can take it much further even after I am gone.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: So, would you like another glass?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: (Strokes the glass in his hand)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Take this bottle of wine home with you and savor it slowly. Maybe eventually, you will come to appreciate its taste.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Throw it to me, throw it to me!
attributes.name: Bridesmaid A

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. Hand it over here.
attributes.name: Groomsman B

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd it go?
attributes.name: Bridesmaid B

attributes.content: My man, you lobbed that thing.
attributes.name: Groomsman A

attributes.content: What's this?!
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Hahahaha! Looks like I'll be waiting for good news from you.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: This... is embarrassing. I'll hand this back to the bride and have her throw it again.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Keep it, and treat it as a good omen. Dossoles has no shortage of fine ladies.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Seems like it's getting dark. If it's not convenient for you to head back right now, you can spend the night at the nearby hotel. I've already asked them to keep a spare room for you.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Thank you for your consideration, Ms. Candela.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I have other business. See you around.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Hmm? Didn't you have something else you wanted to discuss?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto, your life could be a lot more comfortable if you completely cut ties with Bolívar. Have you ever considered that?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Because, its thorns are what brings me joy.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Go forth then, Mr. Ernesto, and bravely trek into that raging storm. Fill every day and night of its life with happiness.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Ugh, my head hurts... I haven't had anything this strong in a long time...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Jeez... Why'd I take the bouquet with me when I left? Well, whatever... I'll just toss it in a trash bin later.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Why are there so many people standing around up there? Señor, excuse me, but would you mind letting me through?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Isn't that the casino from yesterday?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Buddy, you'll want to give it a minute. Someone just died in the casino.
attributes.name: Casino Guest

attributes.content: Someone died?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Some hapless fellow just scored a jackpot. Couldn't handle the stimulation apparently and died on the spot.
attributes.name: Casino Guest

attributes.content: Hmm, that's... quite the cruel twist of fate.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: A stretcher exits from beneath the magnificent gates of the casino. Ernesto can vaguely make out a human figure beneath the white sheet, his brow furrowing into a frown as he prepares to leave.
Suddenly, a gust of wind lifts up the corner of the cloth, revealing a mutilated arm beneath.
(Clenches fist)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Excuse me, would you mind waiting just a moment?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Later, kid. Can't you see that we're busy moving the body?
attributes.name: Casino Worker

attributes.content: Just a moment of your time, please.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: What are you... Haha, a flower? You're pinning a flower to his chest? What, did you know this guy?
attributes.name: Casino Worker

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Who was he then?
attributes.name: Casino Worker

attributes.content: Nobody special. Just an ordinary Bolívarian.
attributes.name: Tequila
